description: Winginx is an alternative web-development suite to your tradition AMP suite, such as XAMPP. Winginx contains NGINX, PHP, MySQL Node.Js, phpMyAdmin, RockMongo, phpMemcachedAdmin, Redis, MongoDB, HostsEditor and various PHP modules, like ionCube and Xdebug.
summary: Winginx is an alternative web-development suite to your tradition AMP suite, such as XAMPP. Winginx contains NGINX, PHP, MySQL Node.Js, phpMyAdmin, RockMongo, phpMemcachedAdmin, Redis, MongoDB, HostsE
author: Alexei Shabalin
